languages.text: "Досадное проявление слабости, Вольный Торговец". {n}Воздух вокруг Хейнрикса начинает потрескивать от разрядов.{/n} "Именем Инквизиции я приговариваю вас, Вистенца Янус Вьятт аб Арам аф Коронус, к смерти".

traits.locale_text: "Досадное проявление слабости, Вольный Торговец". {n}Воздух вокруг Хейнрикса начинает потрескивать от разрядов.{/n} "Именем Инквизиции я приговариваю вас, Вистенца Янус Вьятт аб Арам аф Коронус, к смерти".

languages.text: "A regrettable display of weakness, Rogue Trader." {n}The air around Heinrix begins to crackle with electrical discharge.{/n} "In the name of the Inquisition, I sentence you, Vistenza Janus Vyatt ab Aram af Koronus, to death."
languages.original_text: "Досадное проявление слабости, Вольный Торговец". {n}Воздух вокруг Хейнрикса начинает потрескивать от разрядов.{/n} "Именем Инквизиции я приговариваю вас, Вистенца Янус Вьятт аб Арам аф Коронус, к смерти".

traits.locale_text: "A regrettable display of weakness, Rogue Trader." {n}The air around Heinrix begins to crackle with electrical discharge.{/n} "In the name of the Inquisition, I sentence you, Vistenza Janus Vyatt ab Aram af Koronus, to death."

"A regrettable display of weakness, Rogue Trader." {n}The air around Heinrix begins to crackle with electrical discharge.{/n} "In the name of the Inquisition, I sentence you, Vistenza Janus Vyatt ab Aram af Koronus, to death."

"A regrettable display of weakness, Rogue Trader." {n}The air around Heinrix begins to crackle with electrical discharge.{/n} "In the name of the Inquisition, I sentence you, Vistenza Janus Vyatt ab Aram af Koronus, to death."

"A regrettable display of weakness, Rogue Trader." {n}The air around Heinrix begins to crackle with electrical discharge.{/n} "In the name of the Inquisition, I sentence you, Vistenza Janus Vyatt ab Aram af Koronus, to death."

languages.text: “真是令人遗憾的软弱之举，行商浪人。”{n}海因里希周围的空气开始噼里啪啦地放电。{/n}“以审判庭的名义，我判处你，维丝坦萨·加努斯·维亚特·阿布·阿拉姆·阿夫·科罗努斯，死刑。”
languages.original_text: "A regrettable display of weakness, Rogue Trader." {n}The air around Heinrix begins to crackle with electrical discharge.{/n} "In the name of the Inquisition, I sentence you, Vistenza Janus Vyatt ab Aram af Koronus, to death."

traits.locale_text: “真是令人遗憾的软弱之举，行商浪人。”{n}海因里希周围的空气开始噼里啪啦地放电。{/n}“以审判庭的名义，我判处你，维丝坦萨·加努斯·维亚特·阿布·阿拉姆·阿夫·科罗努斯，死刑。”

languages.text: «Una muestra de debilidad lamentable, Comerciante Independiente». {n}El aire en torno a Heinrix empieza a crepitar con una descarga eléctrica.{/n} «En nombre de la Inquisición, Vistenza Janus Vyatt ab Aram af Koronus, le condeno a muerte».
languages.original_text: "A regrettable display of weakness, Rogue Trader." {n}The air around Heinrix begins to crackle with electrical discharge.{/n} "In the name of the Inquisition, I sentence you, Vistenza Janus Vyatt ab Aram af Koronus, to death."

traits.locale_text: «Una muestra de debilidad lamentable, Comerciante Independiente». {n}El aire en torno a Heinrix empieza a crepitar con una descarga eléctrica.{/n} «En nombre de la Inquisición, Vistenza Janus Vyatt ab Aram af Koronus, le condeno a muerte».

languages.text: 「弱さを見せるとは残念ですね、自由開拓者」{n}ハインリックスのまとう空気が放電してパチパチと音を立てる。{/n}「異端審問庁の名の下に判決を下す。ヴィステンツァ・ヤヌス・ビャット・アブ・アラム・アフ・コロヌス。死刑だ」
languages.original_text: "A regrettable display of weakness, Rogue Trader." {n}The air around Heinrix begins to crackle with electrical discharge.{/n} "In the name of the Inquisition, I sentence you, Vistenza Janus Vyatt ab Aram af Koronus, to death."

traits.locale_text: 「弱さを見せるとは残念ですね、自由開拓者」{n}ハインリックスのまとう空気が放電してパチパチと音を立てる。{/n}「異端審問庁の名の下に判決を下す。ヴィステンツァ・ヤヌス・ビャット・アブ・アラム・アフ・コロヌス。死刑だ」

languages.text: "Eine bedauernswerte Zurschaustellung von Schwäche, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}." {n}Die Luft um Heinrix herum knistert vor elektrischen Entladungen.{/n} "Im Namen der Inquisition verurteile ich Euch, Vistenza Janus Vyatt ab Aram af Koronus, zum Tode."
languages.original_text: "A regrettable display of weakness, Rogue Trader." {n}The air around Heinrix begins to crackle with electrical discharge.{/n} "In the name of the Inquisition, I sentence you, Vistenza Janus Vyatt ab Aram af Koronus, to death."

traits.locale_text: "Eine bedauernswerte Zurschaustellung von Schwäche, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}." {n}Die Luft um Heinrix herum knistert vor elektrischen Entladungen.{/n} "Im Namen der Inquisition verurteile ich Euch, Vistenza Janus Vyatt ab Aram af Koronus, zum Tode."

languages.text: « Une regrettable démonstration de faiblesse, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. » {n}Autour d'Heinrix, l'air commence à crépiter en se chargeant d'électricité.{/n} « Au nom de l'Inquisition, Vistenza Janus Vyatt ab Aram af Koronus, je vous condamne à mort. »
languages.original_text: "A regrettable display of weakness, Rogue Trader." {n}The air around Heinrix begins to crackle with electrical discharge.{/n} "In the name of the Inquisition, I sentence you, Vistenza Janus Vyatt ab Aram af Koronus, to death."

traits.locale_text: « Une regrettable démonstration de faiblesse, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. » {n}Autour d'Heinrix, l'air commence à crépiter en se chargeant d'électricité.{/n} « Au nom de l'Inquisition, Vistenza Janus Vyatt ab Aram af Koronus, je vous condamne à mort. »

languages.text: "Acınası bir zayıflık göstergesi sergiledin Hür Tacir." {n}Heinrix'in etrafındaki hava, elektrikle çatırdamaya başlıyor.{/n} "Vistenza Janus Vyatt ab Aram af Koronus, Engizisyon adına seni ölüme mahkûm ediyorum."
languages.original_text: "A regrettable display of weakness, Rogue Trader." {n}The air around Heinrix begins to crackle with electrical discharge.{/n} "In the name of the Inquisition, I sentence you, Vistenza Janus Vyatt ab Aram af Koronus, to death."

traits.locale_text: "Acınası bir zayıflık göstergesi sergiledin Hür Tacir." {n}Heinrix'in etrafındaki hava, elektrikle çatırdamaya başlıyor.{/n} "Vistenza Janus Vyatt ab Aram af Koronus, Engizisyon adına seni ölüme mahkûm ediyorum."
